mapper.select: select employee_id, (last_name ||':'|| first_name) last_name, to_char(hire_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') hire_date from employees
mapper.insert: insert into employees(employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, hire_date, job_id) values (#{employee_id}, #{first_name}, #{last_name}, #{email}, sysdate, #{job_id})
mapper.update: update employees set last_name = #{last_name} where employee_id = #{employee_id}
